segments.text: When she told me that she would marry no man but Dick , my heart was almost in my mouth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You were scared , too ? I dared not tell you my feeling when I heard that . I almost got fainted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could not and can â€™ t make out the reason why she would set her heart on a man like Dick . He plays the field with many girls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But Sarah says she does not care , so long as he loves her .
segments.speaker: S2
